Text: Beginning with the 7/21 program, I'll be using MP4 instead of MKV as the container. The test MP4 I created plays on every media player I've thrown at it, including QuickTime.

The move to MP4 would be very much appreciated. It's not in HD anyway, and the MKV files don't play nice with MoboPlayer on an HTC Aria.

Thanks for all you do.
